		<title>Joan Rivers' daughter settles malpractice lawsuit in mother's death</title>


		<description>NEW YORK (Reuters) - A New York City clinic has settled a malpractice lawsuit filed by the daughter of comedian Joan Rivers for an undisclosed amount over an ill-fated procedure that led to the celebrity's death, lawyers for the Rivers family said on Thursday.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=JiV81tvklFM:AsBJd6OsHcg:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=JiV81tvklFM:AsBJd6OsHcg:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=JiV81tvklFM:AsBJd6OsHcg:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=JiV81tvklFM:AsBJd6OsHcg:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=JiV81tvklFM:AsBJd6OsHcg:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~4/JiV81tvklFM" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~3/JiV81tvklFM/us-people-rivers-idUSKCN0Y3347</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-people-rivers-idUSKCN0Y3347?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 19:37:49 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-people-rivers-idUSKCN0Y3347?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Jodie Foster's 'Money Monster' holds bankers responsible for financial crisis</title>


		<description>CANNES, France (Reuters) - With Jodie Foster's "Money Monster", which premieres on Thursday at the Cannes Film Festival, Hollywood is expressly holding the banks responsible for the financial crisis.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=CAXu4kCfLLY:spHuB81x9k8:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=CAXu4kCfLLY:spHuB81x9k8:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=CAXu4kCfLLY:spHuB81x9k8:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=CAXu4kCfLLY:spHuB81x9k8:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=CAXu4kCfLLY:spHuB81x9k8:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~4/CAXu4kCfLLY" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~3/CAXu4kCfLLY/us-filmfestival-cannes-money-monster-idUSKCN0Y32JE</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-filmfestival-cannes-money-monster-idUSKCN0Y32JE?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 14:08:17 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-filmfestival-cannes-money-monster-idUSKCN0Y32JE?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Live from Springfield, it's Homer Simpson!</title>


		<description>LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - During his 27-year tenure as the bumbling patriarch of Fox's animated series "The Simpsons," Homer Simpson has achieved many impossible things, from space travel and becoming a superhero to destroying Springfield and winning a Pulitzer Prize.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=AS7GYYRoWSg:FJQrDEO76MY:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=AS7GYYRoWSg:FJQrDEO76MY:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=AS7GYYRoWSg:FJQrDEO76MY:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=AS7GYYRoWSg:FJQrDEO76MY:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=AS7GYYRoWSg:FJQrDEO76MY:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~4/AS7GYYRoWSg" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~3/AS7GYYRoWSg/us-television-simpsons-idUSKCN0Y31P8</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-television-simpsons-idUSKCN0Y31P8?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 17:38:37 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-television-simpsons-idUSKCN0Y31P8?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>ASCAP settles with U.S. over music licensing</title>


		<description>WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The American Society of Composers, Authors and Publishers, better known as the music licensing firm ASCAP, agreed to pay $1.75 million to settle a Justice Department charge that it blocked members from independently licensing their songs, the department said on Thursday.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=x00WJqXAboA:PIml9MkMzQ4:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=x00WJqXAboA:PIml9MkMzQ4:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=x00WJqXAboA:PIml9MkMzQ4:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=x00WJqXAboA:PIml9MkMzQ4:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=x00WJqXAboA:PIml9MkMzQ4:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~4/x00WJqXAboA" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~3/x00WJqXAboA/us-usa-music-idUSKCN0Y32UY</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-music-idUSKCN0Y32UY?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 17:11:30 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-music-idUSKCN0Y32UY?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Timberlake on acting and music producing for 'Trolls'</title>


		<description>CANNES, France - Singer Justin Timberlake says working on upcoming animation "Trolls" became "like an embarrassment of riches" as he was able to combine his acting and music skills as well as go to work everyday at a location close to his family.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=cQK7393d4DU:4xnpNhNTT74:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=cQK7393d4DU:4xnpNhNTT74:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=cQK7393d4DU:4xnpNhNTT74:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=cQK7393d4DU:4xnpNhNTT74:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=cQK7393d4DU:4xnpNhNTT74:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~4/cQK7393d4DU" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~3/cQK7393d4DU/us-filmfestival-trolls-junket-idUSKCN0Y32LS</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-filmfestival-trolls-junket-idUSKCN0Y32LS?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 14:34:30 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-filmfestival-trolls-junket-idUSKCN0Y32LS?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Angry Birds maker Rovio bets nest egg on 3D movie</title>


		<description>HELSINKI (Reuters) - Finnish smartphone games maker Rovio Entertainment Ltd is hoping to revive the cool of its widely-known but aging Angry Birds franchise with an animated 3D Hollywood film financed out of its own pocket.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=yc1jUkMvoDA:ZYiUvXAu2OU:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=yc1jUkMvoDA:ZYiUvXAu2OU:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=yc1jUkMvoDA:ZYiUvXAu2OU:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=yc1jUkMvoDA:ZYiUvXAu2OU:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=yc1jUkMvoDA:ZYiUvXAu2OU:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~4/yc1jUkMvoDA" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~3/yc1jUkMvoDA/us-rovio-angrybirds-movie-idUSKCN0Y32A8</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-rovio-angrybirds-movie-idUSKCN0Y32A8?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 12:46:13 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-rovio-angrybirds-movie-idUSKCN0Y32A8?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Jodie Foster mines human impact of financial risk in 'Money Monster'</title>


		<description>LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - When Jodie Foster wanted to explore the human relationship with technology and virtual intimacy in her latest directorial effort "Money Monster," she opted to use Wall Street as her setting and raise the dramatic stakes by holding George Clooney hostage.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=BXEvkXix46I:wpNV_C5uQ3g:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=BXEvkXix46I:wpNV_C5uQ3g:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=BXEvkXix46I:wpNV_C5uQ3g:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=BXEvkXix46I:wpNV_C5uQ3g:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=BXEvkXix46I:wpNV_C5uQ3g:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~4/BXEvkXix46I" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~3/BXEvkXix46I/us-film-jodiefoster-idUSKCN0Y20LL</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-film-jodiefoster-idUSKCN0Y20LL?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 14:43:13 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-film-jodiefoster-idUSKCN0Y20LL?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Christie's' Impressionst and modern art sales fail to make bright splash</title>


		<description>NEW YORK (Reuters) - The spring art sales ended with a bit of a whimper in New York on Thursday at Christie's' muted auction of Impressionist and modern art.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=RSH993r9AuI:8dxY7Ssj5Bk:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=RSH993r9AuI:8dxY7Ssj5Bk:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=RSH993r9AuI:8dxY7Ssj5Bk:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=RSH993r9AuI:8dxY7Ssj5Bk:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=RSH993r9AuI:8dxY7Ssj5Bk:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~4/RSH993r9AuI" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~3/RSH993r9AuI/us-art-auction-idUSKCN0Y4092</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-art-auction-idUSKCN0Y4092?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>

		<pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 00:04:44 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-art-auction-idUSKCN0Y4092?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Depp back as Mad Hatter in 'Alice Through the Looking Glass'</title>


		<description>LONDON (Reuters) - Hollywood star Johnny Depp returns as the flamboyant Mad Hatter in "Alice Through the Looking Glass" for more big screen fantasy adventures inspired by the much loved stories by Lewis Carroll.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=PnNhaURLBrQ:15FfRvVobME:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=PnNhaURLBrQ:15FfRvVobME:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=PnNhaURLBrQ:15FfRvVobME:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=PnNhaURLBrQ:15FfRvVobME:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=PnNhaURLBrQ:15FfRvVobME:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~4/PnNhaURLBrQ" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~3/PnNhaURLBrQ/us-film-alicethroughthelookingglass-idUSKCN0Y219W</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-film-alicethroughthelookingglass-idUSKCN0Y219W?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 08:44:25 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-film-alicethroughthelookingglass-idUSKCN0Y219W?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Britain calls for more 'distinctive' BBC in governance overhaul</title>


		<description>LONDON (Reuters) - The BBC will face external regulation for the first time in its 94-year history, the government said on Thursday, subjecting it to tighter scrutiny but stopping short of the heavy-handed intervention that some stars and programme-makers had feared.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=PbtGOa16Ks0:pDi8b98VS6s:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=PbtGOa16Ks0:pDi8b98VS6s:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=PbtGOa16Ks0:pDi8b98VS6s:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?a=PbtGOa16Ks0:pDi8b98VS6s:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/entertainment?i=PbtGOa16Ks0:pDi8b98VS6s:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~4/PbtGOa16Ks0" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/entertainment/~3/PbtGOa16Ks0/us-britain-bbc-idUSKCN0Y22S3</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.reuters.com/article/us-britain-bbc-idUSKCN0Y22S3?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 10:41:56 -0400</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://www.reuters.com/article/us-britain-bbc-idUSKCN0Y22S3?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
